name: XmindConsolidate
tagline: Simple workload consolidation in  an Xmind map
body:
# XMindConsolidate
Simple workload consolidation in an Xmind map


To install plugin
-----------------

* find plugin directory of your Xmind installation ( on windows : C:\Program Files (x86)\XMind\plugins )
* download jar file from github [XMindConsolidate_0.0.6.201609301947.jar](https://github.com/mlaval24/XMindConsolidate/releases/download/Beta/XMindConsolidate_0.0.6.201609301947.jar )
and copy to it
* restart xmind

To avoid cache problems
-----------------------
* delete %appdata%\Roaming\XMind\configuration-cathy_win32\org.eclipse.osgi
* restart xmind


To do
-----
* Support of multiple workbooks
* Toogle button
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
